name: Electro Cicin Shield
description:
Provides 1 Shield point for your active character.
When created: If you have Electro Cicin on the field, additionally increase Shield by the amount of Usage(s) it has. (Adds a maximum of 3 additional Shield)
descriptionraw: Provides <color=#FFFFFFFF>1 $[K6] point</color> for your active character.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>When created:</color> If you have <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C124041]</color> on the field, additionally increase $[K6] by the amount of $[K3] it has. (Adds a maximum of 3 additional $[K6])
